title: Sword Hits and Blocks - Combat Sounds
description: 157 High-fidelity sword sounds that will bring light to your video game project (and war hehe)
longDescription:
Sword Hits and Blocks - Combat Sounds

157 High-fidelity sword sounds that will bring light to your video game project (and war hehe). You can alter the pitch to generate even more sounds from the source files provided in this pack.


🔊 YouTube Link (hear the video preview of the 157 SFX)


They are divided in:

- Sword Hard Impacts

- Sword vs Sword

- Whooshes

- Small Blade Hits

- Blocks

- Special Crit

- Pierce Enemy

- Thin Sword

- Impacts

- Extra (take out/pack away sword, sharpening, ui, crafting, etc...)


📜  Tracklist PDF


More about the pack:

- Editable: Easy to generate more sounds if you alter pitch.

- Intuitive file naming.

- Very easy to implement in your game.

- Put more life to your game with this pack.

- A very good resource to put sound to your swords!


[Format]

All files are in:

WAV - Stereo 44.1 Khz, 16bit
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 157

Number of Audio Cues: 157

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 3 minutes and 12 seconds
